title: Getaway
description:
Our story tonight is called “Getaway” and it’s a story about taking a break from the cold and ice. It’s also about the feeling of falling asleep in the sun with a paperback book in your hand, the sound of the waves at night and the pleasant longing for your own bed at the end of time away.

So get cozy and ready to sleep.

Order the book now! hyperurl.co/NothingMuchHappens

This episode mentions alcohol.

Get our ad-free and bonus episodes here: https://nothingmuchhappens.supportingcast.fm

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
author: contact@nothingmuchhappens.com (Curiouscast)
